item.title: Database Basic Concepts
item.author: Author
item.description: Database Management Systems Transactions Concurrent operations may cause problems. Lost Update Problem: T2 updates the data between the time when T1 reads the data and updates it so that T1’s update is lost. Temporary Update Problem: T2 reads T1’s update, but T1 is reverted after that. Incorrect Summary Problem: T1 is applying aggregation while T2 is updating these data. Unrepeatable Read Problem: When the same value is read twice but modified in between.
